text: trauterine growth retardation 90% Microcephaly 90% Seizures 90% Subcutaneous hemorrhage 90% Thrombocytopenia 90% Ventriculomegaly 90% Opacification of the corneal stroma 50% Abnormal pyramidal signs 5% Adult onset - Athetosis - Autosomal dominant inheritance - Basal ganglia calcification - Bradykinesia - Calcification of the small brain vessels - Chorea - Dense calcifications in the cerebellar dentate nucleus - Depression - Dysarthria - Dysdiadochokinesis - Dystonia - Gait disturbance - Hyperref
